title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When copying a package in project 'xx', the package 'ui' is unexpectedly included in the destination.
OB: When copying a package in project 'xx', the package 'ui' is included in the destination 'xx'.
EB: The package 'ui' should not be included in the destination when copying a package in project 'xx'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new project 'xxx'. 
2. Open the package viewer. 
3. Select a package in project 'A'. 
4. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
5. Paste the package in the destination 'xx'.
